roleset.name: action against, in response

role.descr: in response to, target of the action, against/on/towards

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: ...which was caused by the parliamentary counteraction over the constitutional reform...

example.name: arg1, target of action
example.text: Molecular Insight into the Counteraction of Trehalose on Urea-Induced Protein Denaturation Using Molecular Dynamics Simulation
example.arg: on Urea-Induced Protein Denaturation Using Molecular Dynamics Simulation

example.name: arg1: in response to, action against
example.text: Christian singer promotes counteraction against planned burning of the Quran
example.arg: against planned burning of the Quran
